label: 大蔵省
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
見出し読み: おおくらしょうおおくらしょう
説明文: A more descriptive (and philologically more exact) title might be Ministry in Charge of the Great Storehouse, since the organization's chief function appears to have been the administration of storage facilities containing precious metals, jewels, iron, furs, feathers, and other tax goods (p. 810).
